title: Freeforums reserves the right to change the terms with immediate effect

tosdr.tldr: From http://www.freeforums.org/tos.php: "FreeForums.org reserves the right to change the terms, conditions, and notices at any time, and such modifications shall be effective immediately upon posting of such changes."
